Class CollisionResult

public class CollisionResult
extends java.lang.Object

Struct to hold results of a collision.

CollisionResult

public CollisionResult(boolean isColliding,
                       int mtvX,
                       int mtvY)
Populates a new result struct. MTV is to be applied to the first object.

Parameters:
isColliding - True if the boxes collided
mtvX - The x-value of the mtv
mtvY - The y-value of the mtv
